content: Feb 15 Come economic rain or shine  Americans spend $60 billion a year on their pets  a fact that has led investors to seek shelter in pet company shares when the stock market goes to the dogs.
name: IDEXX Laboratories Inc
title: Pets are comforting  but shares of pet-focused companies may not be
